short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay in Focus while you are reading articles on Medium, Wikipedia etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Research suggests that Music can be very effective to keep our minds stay in focus while performing any task. We have created a music tool which will automatically appear on top of your Wikipedia and Medium articles.
Just Play Music and start reading your article. No distractions. Period.
